snippet: Wireless connectivity in the home was a major theme of the Internationale Funkaustellung, the largest European consumer electronics trade fair, which was expected to draw a quarter million visitors and nearly 1,500 exhibitors through Wednesday in...
abstract: Wireless connectivity in the home was a major theme of the Internationale Funkaustellung, the largest European consumer electronics trade fair, which was expected to draw a quarter million visitors and nearly 1,500 exhibitors through Wednesday in Berlin.

headline.main: Home of the Future Still Years Away
